title: Agent Plugin Schema
description: Schema for custom agent plugins in Loki Mode

name.description: Unique agent name (lowercase, 3-50 chars, alphanumeric and hyphens)

trigger.description: Regex pattern for when to activate this agent

prompt_template.description: Prompt template for the agent (supports {{event.*}} variables)

quality_gate.description: Whether this agent participates in quality gate reviews

capabilities.description: List of capabilities this agent provides
